Miscellaneous Highlights: The series will start off with T20Is on July 27 at Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, while the ODIs start on August 2 at R Premadasa Stadium in Colombo.
The series will mark the first time both teams will play under their new coaches, Gautam Gambhir for India and Sanath Jayasuriya for Sri Lanka.
Others: India will be touring the Island nation on the back of their Historic T20 World Cup championship win last month.
